article_title: Hospital starts year in the black

article_metadata.description: COLDWATER — After financial troubles in 2014, the Community Health Center of Branch County (CHC) started 2015 with a profit of $144,792 for January, having budgeted for a $85,000 loss.Trustee treasurer Lindy Cox said, “it’s kind of nice to come to a meeting and have good news for a change.”Patient revenue was up $78,000 over a year ago. The big change came in outpatient revenue, up almost $1.1 million from January 2014.The county-owned hospital made major cost
article_metadata.author: Don Reid dwreid@aol.com
